FirstPitch.description: How high the player should travel upon touching the panel.

FirstSpeed.description: How fast the player should travel upon touching the panel.

IsSideView.description: Size of the panel: True = small False = large

SecondPitch.description: Launch angle on the Y axis upon winning the Quick Time Event.

SecondSpeed.description: Speed of the launch for winning the Quick Time Event.

TrickCount1.description: Number of button prompts on the first set of tricks.

TrickCount2.description: Number of button prompts on the second set of tricks.

TrickCount3.description: Number of button prompts on the third set of tricks.

TrickTime1.description: Time allotted for the first set of tricks.

TrickTime2.description: Time allotted for the second set of tricks.

TrickTime3.description: Time allotted for the third set of tricks.

Extra.name: A special panel which initiates a Quick Time Event.
